action.name: Multiattack
text: The captain makes three melee attacks: two with its scimitar and one with its dagger. Or the captain makes two ranged attacks with its daggers.

action.name: Scimitar
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6+3) slashing damage.

action.name: Dagger
text: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. Hit: 5 (1d4+3) piercing damage.

reaction.name: Parry
text: The captain adds 2 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the captain must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

reaction.name: Spellcasting
text: Ellison is a 4th-level spellcaster. His spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 12, +5 to hit with its spell attacks). Ellison has the following spells prepared:
Cantrips (at will): fire bolt, light, true strike, shocking grasp
1st level (3 slots): chromatic orb, disguise self, expeditious retreat, shield
